mapper.select: select (buy_release_amount- sell_amount) as tradeableAcct,FTCLockedAcct from (select uid,sum(deal_amount) as FTCLockedAcct from ftc_deal where type=2 GROUP BY uid)as t1 LEFT JOIN (select uid,sum(deal_amount) as buy_release_amount from ftc_deal where type in(0,7) and status=6 GROUP BY uid) as t2 ON t1.uid = t2.uid LEFT JOIN (select uid,sum(deal_amount) as sell_amount from ftc_deal where type=1 and status=6 GROUP BY uid) as t3 ON t3.uid = t2.uid where t1.uid= #{uid}
select sum(amount) as FTCRewardAcct from ftc_reward where uid= #{id} GROUP BY uid
